mapper.insert: INSERT INTO poll(id, board_id, title, expire_date, state) VALUES (#{id}, #{boardId}, #{title}, #{expireDateTime}, #{state});
INSERT INTO poll_option(id, poll_id, option_name, option_cnt) VALUES (null, #{pollId}, #{option}, 0);
INSERT INTO poll_user(user_id, poll_id, poll_option, created_at) VALUES (#{userId}, #{pollId}, #{pollOption}, now());
mapper.select: SELECT poll.id FROM poll, board WHERE board_id = board.id

SELECT poll.title as title, poll.expire_date as expire_date, poll.state as state, pu.poll_option as poll_option, po.id as id, po.option_name as option_name, po.option_cnt as option_cnt FROM poll JOIN poll_option po on poll.id = po.poll_id JOIN poll_user pu on pu.poll_id = poll.id WHERE poll.id = #{pollId} and pu.user_id = #{userId} and poll.state != 2
